testNames: landing page should meet basic accessibility requirements

should display dashboard when authenticated (using helper)
should open wizard modal when authenticated
should display appropriate content based on auth state
should connect wallet using email method
should be able to connect to dev server
should load page without critical runtime errors
should handle missing or invalid data gracefully
should handle console errors without breaking page
should handle very long content without breaking layout
should handle rapid navigation without errors
should handle missing optional environment variables
should display hero section with main heading
should display complete navigation with all links

should not have critical console errors
